mapper.select: SELECT a.Menu_id AS id, b.name AS name, (SUM(a.rating_data)*20) / COUNT(a.rating_data) AS ratio FROM Rating AS a JOIN Menu AS b ON (a.Menu_id = b.id) WHERE a.created_at BETWEEN DATE(#{_start}) AND DATE(#{_end})+1 AND a.group_id = #{_groupId} GROUP BY Menu_id
SELECT a.Menu_id AS id, b.name AS name, (SUM(a.rating_data)*20) / COUNT(a.rating_data) AS ratio FROM Rating AS a JOIN Menu AS b ON a.Menu_id = b.id WHERE a.group_id = #{_groupId} GROUP BY Menu_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Rating (User_id, Menu_id, rating_data, group_id) VALUES (#{_userId}, #{_menuId}, #{ratingData}, #{_groupId})
mapper.update: UPDATE Rating SET bad_reason = #{_badreason} WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM (SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM Rating) AS temp) AND group_id = #{_groupId};
